https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/y8GzWvads9hN4n1VttuY2Tih7xk.jpg #direnayol accompanies trans* activist Sevval Kilic during the 21st Istanbul LGBTI Pride caught up in the reflexions of carnivalesque Gezi Park Uprising. #direnayol is a turbulent audiovisual journey witnessing a wind of hope, humour, and solidarity wished to be remembered in the politics of Turkey today. #Resistayol
